resource.name: Revitalization - COVID-19 First Vaccine Doses Administered in Kent County
resource.description: This dataset tracks the number of first COVID-19 vaccine doses administered in Kent County and the percent of Kent County population vaccinated.
resource.attribution: State of Michigan COVID-19 Vaccine Dashboard

resource.name: EPA - Percent of Residents Earning above the Asset Limited, Income Constrained, Employed (ALICE) Threshold by Zip Code
resource.description: Geographical data on residents' earnings in relation to the Asset Limited, Income Constrained, Employed (ALICE) threshold

resource.name: ECC - Clerk: Board and Commission vs. GR City Census Demographics
resource.description: This dataset tracks the demographics of City Boards and Commissions. It also includes the 2010 Census demographic data for the Grand Rapids city population. We also calculate the percent variance between the the percent of residents of a particular race represented on City Boards/Commission in comparison to the percent of that race overall in the City using these data.

resource.name: ECC - Parks: Number of Total Engagement Activities Focused on Resident Issues
resource.description: This dataset measures the number engagement activities (surveys and responses) focused on resident issues. The data is categorized by the organization offering the survey.

resource.name: The Climate Explorer - Daily Temperature and Precipitation (1963 - present)
resource.description: Daily historical data on temperature and precipitation in Grand Rapids since 1963. Climate normals for temperature and precipitation are the average temperature and precipitation ranges for the weather station from 1981-2010.

resource.name: CSID - Website Pageviews
resource.description: Pageviews, unique pageviews, average time spent on page, entrances, bounce rate, and exit rate for every page on the City of Grand Rapids website.
columns_description: Average time spent on the page in seconds
Name of the page
Percent of the time a session ended after viewing the page
Total number of times a session started on the page
Web address of the given page, excluding https://www.grandrapidsmi.gov
Percent of pageviews where a user ended the session on the given page without interacting with anything on the page
Number of unique views
Total number of views
